about.title: About Us
about.missionText: We believe every Indian citizen deserves to understand their legal rights. Our mission is to make legal knowledge accessible to everyone — regardless of education, language, or background.
about.whatWeDoText: We translate complex Indian laws and legal procedures into simple, actionable information. Every topic is explained in three layers: a simple summary anyone can understand, practical steps you can take, and the full legal basis for reference.
about.disclaimerText: This website provides general legal information for educational purposes only. It does not constitute legal advice. For specific legal matters, please consult a qualified lawyer. Laws may change; we strive to keep information current but cannot guarantee absolute accuracy.
about.openSourceText: This project is open source. We welcome contributions to improve content accuracy, add more languages, and expand coverage of legal topics.
